name: ATX-LEDLightControl
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enables control of all lights on an ATX-LED system, including all standard ATX-LED home lights as well as any other light that uses the DALI standard, when connected to the AL-DALI-Pi control system.

To enable control of your lights, log into the ATX-LED ZWD system on your local network (https://me.atxled.com), click the gear icon, and click "Cloud" on the sidebar. This allows you to create an account to link to Alexa. Once you have entered an email, name, and password, then open this skill and link your account. You will be forwarded to the atxled.com site to confirm the link (you should already be logged in if you're using the same browser--if not, log in again).
